pr_title: Fix NPE when Spring Boot Maven Plugin doesn't have <configuration>

timeline.message: Fix NPE when null spring-boot configuration

timeline.author: loosebazooka
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -9,6 +9,8 @@ All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.
 
 ### Fixed
 
+- Fixed `NullPointerException` when the Spring Boot Mavne plugin does not have a `<configuration>` block. ([#2687](https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/jib/issues/2687))

timeline.bodyText: nit: Boolean.parseBoolean returns a boolean and might be the better option here, vs valueOf which returns Boolean objects?
timeline.author: loosebazooka
